name: Love and Hate VR
description:
Save your Love from the Evil! A VR experience from another universe

Use Motioncontrollers
--------------------------------
- Triggers to grab and throw objects and to shoot the gun
- Thumbstick and Facebutton 1 for Teleporting. (You can only teleport to fixed positions)

Hints: 
--------------------------------
- While no enemies are around, you can shoot door buttons
- You can kill enemies with throwable objects

The entire game, including the concept was crafted and coded within the Jam period.
(Characters from UEs Paragon, Sound FX from Soundly, Royalty Free Music from Bensound)
